mapper.update: update review set rev_like = rev_like + 1 where rev_num = #{rev_num}
mapper.insert: insert into review(REV_NUM, BOOK_TITLE, ID, REGDATE, REV_TITLE, REV_CONTENT) values ( REV_SEQ.nextval, #{book_title}, #{id}, sysdate, #{rev_title}, #{rev_content} )
mapper.select: select * from review order by REGDATE desc
SELECT id FROM ( SELECT ID,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(ID) DESC) AS RNM FROM review GROUP BY ID ) z WHERE 5 >= RNM
select * from reglike where rev_num=#{rev_num} and id=#{id}
SELECT rev_num, book_title, id, regdate, rev_title, rev_content, rev_like, rev_scrap FROM REVIEW WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
